item.description:
Attend the tale of Sweeney Todd...

Taking a break from their standard repertoire, the MIT G&S Players are producing Stephen Sondheim's Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street this August. Let's check it out!


From: http://www.allmusical...

"Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street is a macabre tragicomedy based on the legend of a half-mad 19th century English barber. He is driven to crime when his wife and child are taken from him by an evil judge. Unjustly imprisoned, Todd eventually escapes and vows to bring justice not only to the judge who destroyed his life, but to all the people of London. To this end, he forms a partnership with Mrs. Lovett, an enterprising barmistress whose meat pies soon become the tastiest in London!"

When: Sunday, August 8th at 1:30 (2:00 curtain time)
Where: MIT, Stratton Student Center, 2nd floor
Cost**: General public ($12)

**Discounts for students and members of the MIT community. I am also inquiring about a group rate and will update the calendar when I have more information.

To reserve your tickets click here: http://web.mit.edu/gs...

The student center is located at 84 Massachusetts Ave (across the street from Building 7, for those techies). Click here for a campus map http://whereis.mit.ed...
item.how_to_find_us: Meet on the 2nd floor of the student center by the ticket counter. I will have a Meetup sign
item.name: Sweeney Todd at MIT
